dataset.data-sql: select pi.id id, pi.name name, pi.longname longname, pi.microdiscount microdiscount, ps.sku sku, pi.style style, pi.material material, b.brandname, c.name categoryName, pi.rank, pp.initialPrice, pi.componentdesc componentdesc, (select name from code_type_value where codetype = 'measurement_unit_code' and code = pi.unit) unit, decode(pi.status, '-1', '已删除', 1, '已上架', 2, '已下架', 3, '待审核', 4, '审核通过', 5, '审核不通过', 6, '草稿') status, decode(pi.newproduct, 1, '是', 0, '否') newproduct, pi.createtime, usr.name create_by, (SELECT listagg('', '') within GROUP(order by platform, seq) FROM PRODUCT_PHOTO where productid = pi.id and platform = 1) photos, (select name from code_type_value where codetype = 'portalLink' and status = 1 and rownum = 1) || pi.id portalLink from product_info pi left join product_sku ps on pi.id = ps.productId left join product_category_ref pc on pi.id = pc.productid left join product_brand_ref pb on pi.id = pb.productid left join brand_info b on pb.brandid = b.id left join product_category c on pc.categoryid = c.id left join product_price pp on pi.id = pp.productid left join user_info usr on pi.createby=usr.id where pi.status in (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6) order by pi.updateTime desc, pi.id
